select mti.ThirdParty_Mark,cta.Bill_No,CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(cta.Trans_Principal), #{sKey})) AS SIGNED) as Trans_Principal from Creditor_Trans_App cta left join Invest_Record ir on ir.Invest_Id = cta.Invest_Id left join Member_Third_Info mti on mti.Member_ID = ir.Member_ID and mti.Member_Type = 0 where cta.CTA_Id = #{transId}
